boat.construction_details: GRP, mould taken from Alf Last design. Fitted out in wood with galvanised centreboard.
boat.name: Marazan
boat.short_description: Brian Kennel produced hull with interior fit out by John Dawe (sp?).  The main difference to Brian Kennel boats are the stayed mast, bigger gunwales and a raised transome with an enlarged sculling notch. Fully boxed out buoyancy below side thwarts in mahogany faced ply (with access hatches)
